juggernaut.translation[0].definitions[0]: a very large vehicle that carries goods over long distances
juggernaut.translation[0].definitions[1]: a very powerful force, organization etc whose effect or influence cannot be stopped
juggernaut.translation[1].definitions[0]: The software juggernaut Microsoft will continue to lead the industry with its Windows operating system.
juggernaut.translation[1].definitions[1]: something large and powerful that could be harmful to smaller things
The country has fast become an economic juggernaut.
